locations.name: Hogwarts
locations.description: An enchanted castle filled with mystery, intrigue, and excitement. Come stay for a vacation that can only be called magical!

locations.name: Tattooine
locations.description: Come find yourself on a rustic moisture farm.

locations.name: Mushroom Kingdom
locations.description: There are mushrooms everywhere. Please don't eat them, some are sentient and wouldn't like that.
